Title: Secret Team
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Hilary Florido, Katie Mitroff, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven, Pearl and Amethyst form a secret team to keep something hidden from Garnet.
